00025 #ifndef __SCENE_QUERY_H__
00026 #define __SCENE_QUERY_H__
00027 
00028 #include "omega/osystem.h"
00029 #include "omega/scene/SceneManager.h"
00030 #include "omega/scene/SceneNode.h"
00031 
00032 namespace omega
00033 {
00034 namespace scene
00035 {
00037         // Stores a scene query result
00038         struct SceneQueryResult
00039         {
00040                 SceneNode* node;
00041                 float distance;
00042         };
00043 
00045         // Comparison function to sort scene query results by distance.
00046         inline bool SceneQueryResultDistanceCompare(SceneQueryResult& r1, SceneQueryResult& r2)
00047         {
00048                 if(r1.distance < r2.distance) return false;
00049                 return true;
00050         }
00051 
00053         // A list of scene query results.
00054         typedef std::list<SceneQueryResult> SceneQueryResultList;
00055 
00057         class OUTILS_API SceneQuery
00058         {
00059         public:
00060                 enum QueryFlags {QuerySort = 1 << 1, QueryFirst = 1 << 2};
00061 
00062         public:
00063                 SceneQuery(SceneManager* scene): myScene(scene) {}
00064 
00065                 SceneManager* getScene() { return myScene; }
00066 
00067                 virtual const SceneQueryResultList& execute(uint flags = 0) = 0;
00068 
00069                 void clearResults();
00070 
00071         protected:
00072                 SceneQueryResultList myResults;
00073                 SceneManager* myScene;
00074         };
00075 
00077         class OUTILS_API RaySceneQuery: public SceneQuery
00078         {
00079         public:
00080                 RaySceneQuery(SceneManager* scene): SceneQuery(scene) {}
00081 
00082                 void setRay(Ray& ray) { myRay = ray; }
00083                 const Ray& getRay() { return myRay; }
00084 
00085                 virtual const SceneQueryResultList& execute(uint flags = 0);
00086 
00087         private:
00088                 void queryNode(SceneNode* node, SceneQueryResultList& list, bool queryFirst);
00089 
00090         private:
00091                 Ray myRay;
00092         };
00093 }; // namespace scene
00094 }; // namespace omega
